task_description: 在酷狗音乐中搜索张杰的歌.
在酷狗音乐中播放一首推荐的歌并收藏它.
在酷狗音乐的‘我的’页面查看‘我喜欢’的歌.
在酷狗音乐中搜索‘辐射4’的音乐.
在酷狗音乐中新建一个歌单，取名为‘适合工作时听的歌’.
在酷狗音乐中新建一个歌单并加入几首歌.
在酷狗音乐中观看一首歌的MV.
在酷狗音乐中搜索‘抖音热搜’并Like一首搜出来的歌.
在酷狗音乐中，播放主页上的一首歌并在歌曲评论区中发表评论‘真好听’.
在酷狗音乐中搜索‘辐射3’，并收藏一个与其相关的歌单.
Open Kugou Music and search for the song 'See You Again'.
Open Kugou Music, go to the 'Recommended' section, and like the first recommended song.
Open Kugou Music, go to 'My Music', create a new playlist named 'My Favorites', and add the currently playing song to it.
Open Kugou Music and search for the song 'Yesterday' by The Beatles. Then, play the song from the search results.
Open Kugou Music, navigate to the 'Discover' page, and browse the trending music charts. Select the first song on the chart and add it to your favorites.
Open Kugou Music, go to the 'Settings' menu, and change the audio quality to 'High'.
